chart.name: chart.real.charge.by.machine
chart.title: Charge rÃ©elle par machine
chart.dataset:
SELECT 0 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) < 1 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= 0) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))
GROUP BY _machine.name
UNION
SELECT 1 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) < 2 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= 1) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))
GROUP BY _machine.name
UNION
SELECT 2 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) < 3 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= 2) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))
GROUP BY _machine.name
UNION
SELECT 3 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) < 4 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= 3) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))
GROUP BY _machine.name
UNION
SELECT 4 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) < 5 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= 4) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))
GROUP BY _machine.name
UNION
SELECT 5 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) < 6 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= 5) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))
GROUP BY _machine.name

GROUP BY _machine.name

SELECT 7 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) < 8 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= 7) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))

SELECT 11 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) < 12 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= 11) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))
GROUP BY _machine.name

SELECT 12 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) < 13 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= 12) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.real_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))

ORDER BY hour

chart.name: chart.planned.charge.by.machine
chart.title: Charge previsionnelle par machine
chart.dataset:
SELECT 0 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.planned_start_datet) < 1 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.planned_end_datet) >= 0) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.planned_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.planned_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))
GROUP BY _machine.name
UNION
SELECT 1 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.planned_start_datet) < 2 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.planned_end_datet) >= 1) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.planned_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.planned_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))
GROUP BY _machine.name

GROUP BY _machine.name

SELECT 14 as hour, _machine.name AS machine, COUNT(_operationOrder.id)*100 AS charge FROM production_operation_order _operationOrder LEFT JOIN production_prod_resource AS _machineProdResource on (_operationOrder.machine_prod_resource = _machineProdResource.id) LEFT JOIN production_machine as _machine on(_machineProdResource.machine = _machine.id) WHERE (EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.planned_start_datet) < 15 AND EXTRACT(HOUR from _operationOrder.planned_end_datet) >= 14) AND _machine.name = _machine.name AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.planned_start_datet) <= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today)) AND EXTRACT(DAY from _operationOrder.planned_end_datet) >= EXTRACT(DAY from DATE(:today))
GROUP BY _machine.name
UNION

GROUP BY _machine.name
